data.meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.
data.sentence: The word لَمْ comes from the root ل م and is associated with the meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.

data.meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.
data.sentence: The word كَلَّا comes from the root ك ل ل and is associated with the meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.

data.meanings: (Nun-ha-Waw) to prevent, forbid, chide away, prohibit, make one to stop from, restrain, interdict, hinder, desist, refrain.
data.sentence: The word يَنْتَهِ comes from the root ن ه ي and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-ha-Waw) to prevent, forbid, chide away, prohibit, make one to stop from, restrain, interdict, hinder, desist, refrain.

data.meanings: to smote/burn/blacken/tinge, to drag, slap/struck/beat, strike with the wings (when fighting), charge upon, assault/attack.
data.sentence: The word لَنَسْفَعًا comes from the root س ف ع and is associated with the meanings: to smote/burn/blacken/tinge, to drag, slap/struck/beat, strike with the wings (when fighting), charge upon, assault/attack.

data.meanings: (Nun-Saad-Ya) forelock, get the mastery over, get hold of.
data.sentence: The word بِالنَّاصِيَةِ comes from the root ن ص و and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-Saad-Ya) forelock, get the mastery over, get hold of.
